    • Method Detail

      • keyStore

        public OwnedIdentity.Loader keyStore​(java.security.KeyStore keyStore)
        Sets JVM-compatible KeyStore instance to use.

        As of Java 11, only the PKCS#12 key store format is mandatory to support for Java implementations. Your JVM version may support additional formats.

        Note that it is an error to provide both a keyStore and a keyStorePath via keyStorePath(Path). However, at least one of them must be provided.

        Parameters:
        keyStore - Key store to use.
        Returns:
        This loader.
        See Also:
        RFC 7292

      • keyStorePath

        public OwnedIdentity.Loader keyStorePath​(java.nio.file.Path keyStorePath)
        Sets path to file containing JVM-compatible key store.

        As of Java 11, only the PKCS#12 key store format is mandatory to support for Java implementations. Your JVM version may support additional formats.

        Note that it is an error to provide both a keyStorePath and a keyStore via keyStore(KeyStore). However, at least one of them must be provided.

        Parameters:
        keyStorePath - Path to key store to use.
        Returns:
        This loader.
        See Also:
        RFC 7292

      • keyStorePath

        public OwnedIdentity.Loader keyStorePath​(java.lang.String keyStorePath)
        Sets path to file containing JVM-compatible key store.

        As of Java 11, only the PKCS#12 key store format is mandatory to support for Java implementations. Your JVM version may support additional formats.

        Note that it is an error to provide both a keyStorePath and a keyStore via keyStore(KeyStore). However, at least one of them must be provided.

        Parameters:
        keyStorePath - Path to key store to use.
        Returns:
        This loader.
        See Also:
        RFC 7292

      • keyStorePassword

        public OwnedIdentity.Loader keyStorePassword​(char[] keyStorePassword)
        Parameters:
        keyStorePassword - Password of provided key store, if required.
        Returns:
        This loader.

      • keyAlias

        public OwnedIdentity.Loader keyAlias​(java.lang.String keyAlias)
        Parameters:
        keyAlias - Alias of certificate with associated private key in provided key store. Can be omitted if the provided key store only contains one certificate with a private key.
        Returns:
        This loader.

      • keyPassword

        public OwnedIdentity.Loader keyPassword​(char[] keyPassword)
        Parameters:
        keyPassword - Password of private key associated with designated certificate in key store, if required.
        Returns:
        This loader.

      • load

        public OwnedIdentity load()
                   throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Uses provided details to load key store and extract a certificate chain, certificate and private key, and then uses these to create a new OwnedIdentity.
        Returns:
        Loaded identity.
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - If the key store does not contain the necessary certificates and private key, or it those cannot be accessed due to bad passwords and/or a bad alias being specified, or the key store contains data or details that cannot be interpreted or supported properly.
        java.io.IOException - If the key store at the specified keyStorePath could not be read.
        See Also:
        RFC 5280
